# Mihir Agarwal

Hi, I am currently a Research Fellow at Microsoft Research India, where I am currently working in the intersection of Representation Learning and Dense Retrieval under the mentorship of [Kirankumar Shiragur](https://sites.google.com/view/kiran-shiragur), [Ankit Garg](https://ankit-garg-6.github.io/), and [Neeraj Kayal](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/people/neeraka/)


Previously, I completed my B.Tech from the [Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar](https://iitgn.ac.in/) in Electrical Engineering with Honors and a Minor in Computer Science and Engineering.
